## OpenApiSpecOptions.endpointMapping property

Mapping of urls to spec forms, by default: <br> { <br> '/openapi.json': {<!-- -->version: '3.0.0', format: 'json'<!-- -->}<!-- -->, <br> '/openapi.yaml': {<!-- -->version: '3.0.0', format: 'yaml'<!-- -->}<!-- -->, <br> }

**Signature:**

```typescript
endpointMapping?: {
        [key: string]: OpenApiSpecForm;
    };
```
